languages.text: "Как вы могли заметить, Футфол сейчас пребывает в кризисе. Его людям не помешало бы покровительство такого человека, как вы".

traits.locale_text: "Как вы могли заметить, Футфол сейчас пребывает в кризисе. Его людям не помешало бы покровительство такого человека, как вы".

languages.text: "As you may have noticed, Footfall is currently in a state of crisis. Its people would benefit from the patronage of a figure such as yourself."
languages.original_text: "Как вы могли заметить, Футфол сейчас пребывает в кризисе. Его людям не помешало бы покровительство такого человека, как вы".

traits.locale_text: "As you may have noticed, Footfall is currently in a state of crisis. Its people would gain from the patronage of a figure such as yourself."
"As you may have noticed, Footfall is currently in a state of crisis. Its people would gain from the patronage of a figure such as yourself."
"As you may have noticed, Footfall is currently in a state of crisis. Its people would benefit from the patronage of a figure such as yourself."
"As you may have noticed, Footfall is currently in a state of crisis. Its people would benefit from the patronage of a figure such as yourself."
"As you may have noticed, Footfall is currently in a state of crisis. Its people would benefit from the patronage of a figure such as yourself."

languages.text: 「気づいているだろうが、フットフォールは現在危機に瀕している。君のような人物の支援があれば、フットフォールの民は恩恵に与れるだろう」
languages.original_text: "As you may have noticed, Footfall is currently in a state of crisis. Its people would benefit from the patronage of a figure such as yourself."

traits.locale_text: 「気づいているだろうが、フットフォールは現在危機に瀕している。君のような人物の支援があれば、フットフォールの民は恩恵に与れるだろう」

languages.text: “或许您已经注意到了，落脚港目前处于危急状态。落脚港的人民需要您这样的大人物赞助。”
languages.original_text: "As you may have noticed, Footfall is currently in a state of crisis. Its people would benefit from the patronage of a figure such as yourself."

traits.locale_text: “或许您已经注意到了，落脚港目前处于危急状态。落脚港的人民需要您这样的大人物赞助。”

languages.text: «Como ya se habrá percatado, Paso se encuentra sumida en una crisis. Sus gentes se verían harto beneficiadas del patrocinio de una figura como usted».
languages.original_text: "As you may have noticed, Footfall is currently in a state of crisis. Its people would benefit from the patronage of a figure such as yourself."

traits.locale_text: «Como ya se habrá percatado, Paso se encuentra sumida en una crisis. Sus gentes se verían harto beneficiadas del patrocinio de una figura como usted».

languages.text: « Comme vous l'aurez peut-être remarqué, Castel connaît actuellement une crise sévère et ses habitants auraient grand besoin du soutien d'une personne telle que vous. »
languages.original_text: "As you may have noticed, Footfall is currently in a state of crisis. Its people would benefit from the patronage of a figure such as yourself."

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous l'aurez peut-être remarqué, Castel connaît actuellement une crise sévère et ses habitants auraient grand besoin du soutien d'une personne telle que vous. »

languages.text: "Wie Ihr vielleicht bemerkt habt, befindet Footfall sich aktuell in einer Krise. Das Volk würde von der Protektion durch eine Person wie Euch profitieren."
languages.original_text: "As you may have noticed, Footfall is currently in a state of crisis. Its people would benefit from the patronage of a figure such as yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr vielleicht bemerkt habt, befindet Footfall sich aktuell in einer Krise. Das Volk würde von der Protektion durch eine Person wie Euch profitieren."

languages.text: "Fark etmiş olabileceğiniz gibi Binliman şu anda krizde. Halkın sizin gibi bir figürün iltimasına çok ihtiyacı var."
languages.original_text: "As you may have noticed, Footfall is currently in a state of crisis. Its people would benefit from the patronage of a figure such as yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Fark etmiş olabileceğiniz gibi Binliman şu anda bir kriz hâlinde. Halkın, sizin gibi bir figürün himayesine çok ihtiyacı var."
